name: Objects discovery
description: Searching a new objects or objects parameters, using ICMP echo reply (ping), query for zabbix-agent and snmp. Return JSON object

ranges.description: IP addresses ranges, separated by comma

sleep.description: Sleep time between query to the new IP in the range in sec

scanRepetitionTime.description: Time (in sec) to repeat scan after completed

usePing.description: Use ICMP echo reply (PING) for scan

getHostname.description: Resolve host name for each IP using OS resolve method

zabbixItems.description: Comma separated Zabbix items with parameters

SNMPOIDs.description: Comma separated SNMP OIDs. Result will ba a string for one OID and object {<OID1>: <result1>, <OID2>: <result2>} for multiple
